newsitem.title: USA: U.S. Stockpile to open cobalt bid on Feb 20.
newsitem.headline: U.S. Stockpile to open cobalt bid on Feb 20.

text.p: U.S. Stockpile will open its negotiated bid for cobalt on Feb 20, a Defense National Stockpile official said.
"Negotiations will commence shortly thereafter," the official added.
The outcome of the sale is keenly awaited by the cobalt market, traders said.

In the previous negotiated bid sale in December, Stockpile awarded just a fraction of the metal to one company, dismissed some other bids, and did not award metal to certain traders who appeared to have offered higher prices, traders said at the time.
